Transition area. The idea behind this parametrization is that: one glass module with its wrap is always a size of 4 crystal modules with its wraps. Then the transition area (where glass meets crystals) has no gaps
+----------------+----------------+ | +----+ +----+ | +----------+ | | | | | | | | | | | +----+ +----+ | | | | | +----+ +----+ | | | | | | | | | | | | | | +----+ +----+ | +----------+ | +----------------+----------------+ crystal glass
This implies that: GlassModule_wrap = 2*CrystalModule_wrap GlassModule_sx = 2*CrystalModule_sx GlassModule_sy = 2*CrystalModule_sy
